root.title: u.s. bank discount borrow 310 mln dlr
root.body: u.s. bank discount window borrow less extend credit averag 310 mln dlr week wednesdai februari 25 feder reserv sai fed sai overal borrow week fall 131 mln dlr 614 mln dlr extend credit 10 mln dlr 304 mln dlr week second half two week statement period net borrow prior week averag 451 mln dlr comment two week statement period end februari 25 fed sai bank averag net free reserv 644 mln dlr dai 1.34 billion two week earlier feder reserv spokesman tell press brief larg singl dai net miss fed reserv project week wednesdai sai natur float act bit strang time year note poor weather latest week spokesman sai natur float rang 500 mln dlr fridai give reason nearli on billion dlr thursdai wednesdai fed spokeman give reason thursdai high float sai 750 mln dlr wednesdai float figur due holdov transport float two wide separ fed district week whole sai float relat adjust small add fall neg 750 mln dlr tuesdai due number correct unrel cash letter error six district around countri spokesman sai tuesdai wednesdai two differ clear bank system problem secur feder fund wire hold open 2000 2100 est dai howev sai problem clear afternoon evid reserv impact week end wednesdai 45 pct net discount window borrow make smallest bank 30 pct 14 larg monei center bank 25 pct larg region institut wednesdai 55 pct borrow account monei center bank 30 pct larg region 15 pct smallest bank fed spokesman sai bank system excess reserv thursdai mondai tuesdai deficit fridai wedndsdai produc small daili averag deficit week whole two week period sai rel high excess reserv daili avearg almost smallest bank
